item.title: Guanine
item.description: General Description Name Value Level S-1 / C-1 Discovered 2020 / A. potteri & P. bistriata Synonym Molecular formula C₅H₅N₅O CAS 73-40-5 SMILES O=C1C(N=CN2)=C2N=C(N)N1 InChI InChI=1S/C5H5N5O/c6-5-9-3-2(4(11)10-5)7-1-8-3/h1H,(H4,6,7,8,9,10,11) Precursor 1 [M+H]⁺ 152.05669 Precursor 2 Precursor 3 HDX 4 Precursor HDX 1 [M(D₄)+D]⁺ 157.
